name: Vikings HEXA Block !
description:
*** NEW *** Best Puzzle Game!
Move hexagonal blocks to fill a grid. Try to retrieve all the golden skulls and complete the Vikings shields.

Vikings Hexa Block! Is an incredible new puzzle game! Come and discover a multitude of puzzles with an atmosphere coming from the world of the Vikings.

Many levels of difficulty available, fun for all ages.

MAIN CHARACTERISTICS
- Learn how to play easily and quickly.
-Tons of levels with lots of challenges.
-Several levels of difficulty.
-NO TIME LIMIT
-You can play offline at any time.
-Amazing graphics and music to Vikings themes.
-Hints available.

HINTS
You can use the hints to help you complete the Puzzles. The Vikings will help you solve more complicated puzzles.

SHOPPING
Vikings Hexa Block! Uses a proper currency call SKOLD. You can use the SKOLDs to buy hints of any kind. There are several ways to get SKOLDs for FREE or you can get them through the in-app purchases.

FACEBOOK
Sign in to Facebook, you can invite, send / receive gifts with your friends and soon ... Even more ...


NOTES
Vikings Hexa Block! Is a completely FREE game with banner ads. You can also listen to advertising videos to earn SKOLDs.


Like us on FACEBOOK
https://www.facebook.com/JewelWorldSK/


Have Fun !
